title: All Kinds of Faces
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: What makes you happy or mad? All Kinds of Faces shows emotions on the faces of young children. Students have the opportunity to discuss faces and the emotions associated with them. Detailed, supportive photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support beginning readers.
meta: excited, face, happy, mad, sad, scared, shy, sleepy, sorry
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
Simple Sentences : Recognize and use simple sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
